title: Ace
description: One drink too many,And I ended up married.Our marriage isn't what it seems.Neither is Sienna.She's beautiful but deadly. I can see it in her eyes.She might not be a hardened criminal like me,But there's something beneath the surface she isn't telling me.And I've seen under those clothes, it's not a silly little tattoo.No, we both have real demons.Mine? Mr. Money, the bastard who keeps trying to hurt my brothers, the High Rollers MC.But hers? No idea.I guess I'll have to get my new wife to tell me, that is, if she can even remember my name.F*cking Vegas.
author: Kasey Krane
